title: All Too Quiet

en: #NAME, I feel like you've been ignoring me. I know your new business takes up a lot of your time, but you can't just wave me to the side because you're busy. Please let's spend some time with me.

yes_caption: You're right, my bad. Sure thing, babe. You got it.
no_caption: I know, but this is my life now, at least for a while. I'm sorry.

en: "Thank you so much, honey. It's just... I've had a hard week, and when you're working so hard, I feel like I've got to handle everything by myself."
"It's okay. I know you're busy. It's just not the same as when we first started dating. I'm sorry. I'll try to get more used to it."
Are you serious? Maybe that's so, but I didn't sign up for this.
